summary: This is an internal NSD Daily News Brief warning staff about media outlets reporting potentially classified documents. It includes a summary from the Attorney General's News Briefing reporting that Fusion GPS attempted to link President Trump to convicted pedophile Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Glenn Simpson
persons.context: Founder of Fusion GPS who reportedly pushed stories to journalists attempting to link President Trump to Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Convicted in 2008 for soliciting sex from an underage girl; reportedly had a close relationship with former President Bill Clinton and was the subject of Fusion GPS efforts to link him to President Trump.

persons.name: Bill Clinton
persons.context: Described as having been 'once buddies' with convicted pedophile Jeffrey Epstein.
